parameter.name: refreshActualRate
parameter.label: Actual Temperature Refresh Rate
parameter.description: Experimental feature! Rate of the actual refresh in minutes. 0-9=refresh disabled. Minimum refresh rate once/10 minutes, recommended 60min. The settings of the heating thermostats are changed to trigger an update of temperature, as the actual temperature only is updated when the valves changes.
